amendment.description: Amendments sought to delete language that prohibits insurance plans within the Federal Health Benefits Plan from including coverage for abortion services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 7 in the Congressional Record of September 16, 1997, to delete the provisions in the bill that prohibit any insurance plan within the Federal Health Benefits Plan from including coverage for abortion services.

action.text: On agreeing to the Lowey amendments (A003) Failed by voice vote.
